references: As discussed in the main paper, ResNet-20 on CIFAR-10 exhibits overfitting, which we further investigate here. It was observed in the maint ext that FedAvg-mqat has an implicit regularisation effect and thus achieves better validation accuracy for the full-precision model by avoiding overfitting despite that not being the main objective. We show experimental comparisons of our proposed mqat to other standard methods of regularization with different strength of weight decay (measured by regularisation term Î»WDsubscriptğœ†WD\lambda_{\text{WD}}) and drop-out before the last full-connected layer of the network in TableÂ 4. Despite not being its primary objective, our FedAvg-mqat variant achieves considerable gains in full-precision accuracy in comparison to standard approaches used to avoid overfitting. Fig.Â 4 shows how the validation loss of the baseline is increasing after 2.5â€‹k2.5ğ‘˜2.5k rounds and the corresponding validation accuracy on the right. For mqat, we observe no overfitting according to the validation loss.
